segments.text: What's wrong with you , young man ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Doctor , I have a bad cough and a headache .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know , but I feel terrible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me examine you.Don ' t worry.It ' s nothing serious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think I should lie in bed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , stay in bed and drink a lot of water.Your fever will be gone in a day or two .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK.Do you think I can play football tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course not.You need a good rest .
segments.speaker: S1
